official.headline: Smooth Technological Transition
official.anchor_line: Stenograd celebrates a successful transition to newer systems as unified city improvements unfold.
official.contextual_reframing: The recent technological adjustments enhance citizen experience, underscoring the city's resilience and forward momentum.

underground.headline: City on the Brink
underground.anchor_line: Massive upheaval as protests shake Stenograd while leaders falter.
underground.contextual_reframing: Sabotage and blackouts expose cracks in the facade; the people demand truth and change.
